rubrics.title: Clear roof and gutters of debris

rubric.low: No debris present on the roof or in the gutters
rubric.medium: Some debris present on the roof or in the gutters
rubric.high: Lots of debris present on the roof or in the gutters

rubric.medium: Some gutter guards installed (or unclear if guards are installed)

rubrics.title: Extend gutter downspouts away from the house

rubric.low: Downspouts extend 5-10 feet from the foundation
rubric.medium: Downspouts extend 2-4 feet from the foundation
rubric.high: Downspouts discharge near to the foundation

rubric.low: Fully non-combustible siding installed (fiber cement, brick, stucco, etc.)
rubric.medium: Mixed materials or partial non-combustible siding (fiber cement, brick, stucco, etc.)

rubrics.title: Use Class A fire-rated or Class 4 impact-resistant roofing
Use non-combustible fencing within five feet of the home

rubric.low: No fencing or non-combustible fencing within 5 feet of the house
rubric.medium: Mixed fencing materials within 3-5 feet of the house
rubric.high: Combustible fencing within 2-3 feet of the house

rubric.low: Garage door appears to be fully reinforced and in excellent condition
rubric.medium: Garage door appears to be partially reinforced (or unclear) and in good condition
rubric.high: Garage door appears to be unreinforced or in poor condition

rubrics.title: Trim tree branches and shrubs around the house

rubric.low: Close to no branches or shrubs within 5 feet of the house
rubric.medium: Most branches and shrubs are trimmed or removed
rubric.high: Overhanging or dead branches and/or shrubs close to the house

rubric.low: All openings appear to be sealed
rubric.medium: Most openings appear to be sealed
rubric.high: Apparent gaps around multiple openings (windows, doors, etc.)

rubrics.title: Grade the landscape to slope away from the foundation

rubric.low: Ground slopes away from the foundation and has a 6-inch drop over 10 feet
rubric.medium: Ground slopes away from the foundation

rubrics.title: Apply waterproof sealant to foundation walls

rubric.low: Complete coverage with high-quality waterproof sealant and proper drainage
rubric.medium: Partial application or aging sealant showing wear
rubric.high: No waterproof sealant applied or deteriorated covering

rubric.low: Chimney appears to be fully reinforced (or no chiminey is present) and in excellent condition
rubric.medium: Chimney appears to be partially reinforced (or unclear) and in good condition
rubric.high: Chimney appears to be unreinforced or in poor condition

rubric.low: All exterior pipes properly insulated with weather-resistant materials
rubric.medium: Basic foam covers on some pipes but incomplete coverage
rubric.high: Exposed pipes with no insulation or deteriorated covering

rubrics.title: Create a non-flammable (e.g. gravel or stone) barrier around the foundation

rubric.low: Complete 18-24 inch wide barrier of non-flammable material
rubric.medium: Partial barrier or inadequate width (less than 18-24 inches)
rubric.high: No gravel or stone barrier around the foundation

rubric.low: Roof-to-wall connections are fully reinforced and in excellent condition
rubric.medium: Roof-to-wall connections are partially reinforced (or unclear) and in good condition
rubric.high: Roof-to-wall connections are not reinforced or in poor condition
